PingPongActor - Class in Actor
The PingPongActor class is a subclass of the Actor class.
PingPongActor(String) - Constructor for class Actor.PingPongActor
Constructor that creates a new PingPongActor with the given name and loads a list of predefined insults
PingPongDialog - Class in Controller
The class PingPongDialog extends JDialog and allows the user to select two actors from the list of available actors, and sends a ping-pong message between them by using the controller's TestPingPong method.
PingPongDialog(Controller) - Constructor for class Controller.PingPongDialog
Constructs a new PingPongDialog object and initializes the dialog with the list of actors and the functionality to send the ping-pong message.

Overrides the processMessage method of the Actor class, which allows to invoke methods on the instance passed in the constructor.
